ui.dialogs.more_info_control.restored.no: This entity is no longer being provided by the {integration} integration. If the entity is no longer in use, delete it in settings.
ui.dialogs.entity_registry.no_unique_id: This entity (''{entity_id}'') does not have a unique ID, therefore its settings cannot be managed from the UI. See the {faq_link} for more detail.

The enabled entities will be added to Home Assistant in {delay} seconds

ui.dialogs.entity_registry.editor.note: Napomena: to možda neće raditi još sa svim integracijama.
ui.dialogs.entity_registry.editor.area_n: By default the entities of a device are in the same area as the device. If you change the area of this entity, it will no longer follow the area of the device.

The orientation transformation to use for the camera stream.

ui.dialogs.zha_reconfigure_device.introd: Reconfigure a device on your Zigbee network. Use this feature if your device is not functioning correctly.

ui.dialogs.zha_reconfigure_device.run_in: You can close this dialog and the reconfiguration will continue in the background.
ui.dialogs.zha_reconfigure_device.in_pro: The device is being reconfigured. This may take some time.
ui.dialogs.zha_reconfigure_device.config: The device reconfiguration failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

ui.dialogs.zha_device_info.services.reco: Ponovno konfiguriaj ZHA uređaj (liječenje uređaja). Upotrijebite ovo ako imate problema s uređajem. Ako je uređaj u pitanju uređaj za bateriju, provjerite je li budan i prihvaća naredbe kada koristite ovu uslugu.
